name: Bouncing Blue Dash - Jump In A Color-Ful Madness World Free
name_original: Bouncing Blue Dash - Jump In A Color-Ful Madness World Free
description:
Let's make a crazy frenzy in the world of colors! Your mission is simple: Collect as much coins as possible with your crazy Blue Dot and avoid all the obstacles to survive. Sounds easy, doesn't it? Try the challenge!

Free Version - We save your costs!

> > > Award Winner Game - Best Free Game of the Month < < <

"Cool game with nice and clean design. Huge addiction!" - Stew. G.

"I can't stop playing. I love the speed of it! Thumbs up guys!" - Val. M.

• Awesome graphics!
• Easy gameplay!
• Unlock all levels!
• Real challenge!
• Cool music and sounds!
• Various difficulties!
• Play single or beat friends!
• Share your records!
